String.string: Go to the cave at the northern end, where the Valkyon Federation soldiers are preparing to launch an attack on the Ebon Tower. Then meet with Centurion Traveron and find out about the tower.
Go to the Ebon Tower {@LinkCreature:251#1501#teleportal} with Killian's gem.
Go to the Ebon Tower teleportal with Killian's gem.
Enter the Ebon Tower and defeat {@LinkCreature:3009#2101#Maceris}. [You must select Ebon Tower (Solo) from the {@LinkCreature:251#1501#Teleportal} to advance this quest.]

Defeat Thulsa's guardian {@LinkCreature:3009#5102#Kaersidar} in the Ebon Tower - Quintus.
(Use the {@linkcreature:3009#1009#teleportal} to the Ebon Tower - Quintus.)
This can't be...I should have the power!
Go to the Altar of Death and defeat Thulsa.
Inner Chamber of the Ebon Tower
I think Thulsa escaped through the teleportal!
Investigate the Ebon Tower {@LinkCreature:251#1501#teleportal} in Vale of Spires to find traces of Thulsa.
